error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'percentage_denominator' (100) was used instead of 'iwatch_price' (300).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 735
The discount for an iPhone 12 is $800 x 15/100 = $<<800*15/100=120>>120.
So, the iPhone will now cost $800 - $120 = $<<800-120=680>>680.
The discount for an iWatch is $300 x 10/100 = $<<300*10/100=30>>30.
So, the iWatch will now cost $100 - $30 = $<<100-30=70>>70.
The total cost of the iPhone and iWatch is $680 + $70 = $<<680+70=750>>750.
The cashback will be $750 x 2/100 = $<<750*2/100=15>>15.
Thus, Dexter will only pay $750 - $15 = $<<750-15=735>>735.
